data.message: I mean a black kid got taken away while I was in court.. there's like barely any black people here they're just gonna throw him in a bunch of foster homes here locally that's confusing... and who knows how he is gonna be treated.

replies.message: And he got taken away for no reason the chick was providing clothes and food and had a job but she was staying at the battered women's shelter and they scope people out at places like that for cps for removal the same with home nurses and parenting classes

They legit said she was too dumb to take care of him..  it's f.cking absurd man. She obviously is smart enough to have a job, come to court, and provide resources for the son... they are picking on her cause they can and they can get funding out of her she will do whatever classes or treatment they demand cause she is poor and alone and wants her baby back.
Here they use the men against us especially if you are a victim of domestic abuse if they can create drama they can use it to substantiate reasons for removal
